### Using Collapse
```jsx noeditor
const CollapseExample = require('./Collapse.examples.tsx').CollapseExample;
<CollapseExample/>
```

```jsx static
const Button = require('../button/Button.tsx').default;
const Collapse = require('./Collapse.tsx').default;

<div>
    <Button color="primary" tag="button" onClick={this.toggle} aria-expanded={this.state.expanded}>Toggle</Button>
    <Collapse isOpen={this.state.expanded}>
        <div className="card">
            This is an example div. 
            It will collapse and expand by clicking on 'Toggle' button.
        </div>
    </Collapse>

</div>
```
